definition: to fulfill one's dream/(divination) to predict the future by interpreting a dream/oneiromancy
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: Making money and accomplishing tasks is hard work, but well worth it.
sentences.chinese: 赚钱和圆梦都是辛苦活，但是值得这么做。

sentences.english: To realize his impossible dream, Remi has lost a lot.
sentences.chinese: 为了圆梦，小米已经失去了很多。

sentences.english: She can complement him well to help him realize his dreams.
sentences.chinese: 她能在为他圆梦方面提供互补。

definition: (of a ship) to set sail/(of an aeroplane) to take off/also written 起航[qi3 hang2]
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
(one's) original intention, aspiration etc/(Buddhism) "beginner's mind" (i.e. having an attitude of openness when studying a subject just as a beginner in that subject would)
lit. to fly upwards swiftly/fig. rapid advance/rapidly developing (situation)
to aspire to the throne/to aim at (the first place etc)
(of a ship) to set sail/(of an aeroplane) to take off/also written 啟航|启航[qi3 hang2]
